Language.String: CODESYS Soft-PLC für CTH3 C37-001S2 ohne harte Echtzeitgarantien.
CODESYS V3 Soft-PLC pour CTH3 C37-001S2 sans garantie d´un système temps réel strict.
CODESYS V3 Soft-PLC para CTH3 C37-001S2 sin estrictas garantías de tiempo real.
Soft-PLC CODESYS V3 per CTH3 C37-001S2 senza garanzie di tempo reale stringenti.

DeviceInfo.Name: CODESYS Control arm CTH3 C37-001S2v28
DeviceInfo.Description: CODESYS Soft-PLC for CTH3 C37-001S2 with non realtime capabilities (CODESYS Control arm CTH3 C37-001S2)

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent after CodeInit. Is called inside the task safe section and only at online-change! (e.g. the copy code for online-change is executed here). Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent, if an exception occurred in the context of an application. Context=Exception task or exception task itself. Debugging=Depends on the task

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Login of a client in this application. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Logout of a client in this application. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called before reading inputs. Context=IEC task. Debugging=Enabled

ts:setting.name: description

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called before writing outputs. Context=IEC task. Debugging=Enabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called after writing outputs. Context=IEC task. Debugging=Enabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent cyclically in the debug loop, if the IEC task is halted on a breakpoint. Context=IEC task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent right before shutdown of the runtime system. Context=RTS Main loop. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent before exit the communication servers during shutdown. Context=RTS Main loop. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent before exit all tasks during shutdown. Context=RTS Main loop. Debugging=Disabled

Parameter.Name: Input 0-1 Ctrlword
Parameter.Description: bit0-4 input range 0:0~5V,1:0~10V,2:0~20mA,3:4~20mA,0x10:+-2.5V,0x11:+-5V;bit5-7,sampling period(HZ)0:200,1:100,2:50,3:20,4:10,5:1000, bit12(4~20mA) direction 0:Upscale 1:Downscale;bit14 must 1

Parameter.Name: Input 2-3 Ctrlword
Parameter.Description: bit0-4 input range 0:0~5V,1:0~10V,2:0~20mA,3:4~20mA,0x10:+-2.5V,0x11:+-5V;bit5-7,sampling period(HZ)0:200,1:100,2:50,3:20,4:10,5:1000, bit12(4~20mA) direction 0:Upscale 1:Downscale;bit14 must 1

Parameter.Name: HSC0 MODE
Parameter.Description: bit0~bit3:HSC Mode;bit4:Z lock disable 0:enable 1:disable;bit5:z clear disable 0:enable 1:disable;bit6:reserve;bit7:clear lock data 0:clear 1:not clear

Parameter.Name: HSC0 Current Value Offset In Module
HSC0 Preset Value Offset In Module
HSC0 Speed Test Offset In Module
HSC0 Ctrl
Parameter.Description: bit0:Reset Level 1:High 0:Low;bit1~bit2:quad Rate 0:4x,1:2x,2:1x;bit3:Direction 0:DeCrease,1:Increase;bit4:Direction Update 0:Not update,1:Update;bit5:Preset Value Update 0:Not update,1:Update;bit6: Current Value Update:0:Not update,1:Update;bit7: HSC Enable 0:disable 1:Enable

Parameter.Name: HSC1 MODE
Parameter.Description: bit0~bit3:HSC Mode;bit4:Z lock disable 0:enable 1:disable;bit5:z clear disable 0:enable 1:disable;bit6:reserve;bit7:clear lock data 0:clear 1:not clear

Parameter.Name: HSC1 Ctrl
Parameter.Description: bit0:Reset Level 1:High 0:Low;bit1~bit2:quad Rate 0:4x,1:2x,2:1x;bit3:Direction 0:DeCrease,1:Increase;bit4:Direction Update 0:Not update,1:Update;bit5:Preset Value Update 0:Not update,1:Update;bit6: Current Value Update:0:Not update,1:Update;bit7: HSC Enable 0:disable 1:Enable

Parameter.Name: HSC1 Speed Test Time Offset In Module
